text: Perhaps it shouldn't have trusted the S-Bahn this morning.
Looks like Uni2Work got lost on its way to class...we'll send a search party to bring it back.
It is taking longer to respond than a professor to an email during the holidays.
I heard is taking a course on procrastination, and it's acing it.
I think Uni2Work is trying to teach us the value of patience and perseverance in academia.
It's pulling an all-nighter trying to stay online.
I guess you'll have to get to work, too.
Uni2Work is fully caffeinated and ready for your academic needs.
Uni2Work is up and running, ready to handle all your academic procrastination needs.
